trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_SEQ_00<tab>Cahciua regards you and your companions with a sympathetic gaze.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yesterland guard.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_01<tab>Gather information at the starglass.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_03<tab>Defeat the fiend.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the old-fashioned knight.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_000_001<tab>I had braced myself for it, but to actually erase the Endless is...hard.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_KRILE_000_002<tab>This is Living Memory's true appearance...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_ERENVILLE_000_003<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_004<tab>I chose this path. I won't halt my steps.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_005<tab>Don't torment yourselves so. I asked this of you, so the burden lies with me.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_006<tab>And remember, we Endless are but facsimiles crafted from memories. You needn't feel guilt for erasing us.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_KRILE_000_007<tab>Be that as it may, it's so hard to say good-bye...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_008<tab>It is. Nonetheless, it's our duty as the living to know and remember them.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_009<tab>So let's pull ourselves together and keep at it. Keep seeking them out.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_010<tab>I'd appreciate that. Come, let's head to the next zone.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_011<tab>Yesterland, it's called, and another zip line at the Gate of Remembrance will take you there.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_012<tab>Ah, but I ought to mention...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_013<tab>While shutting down a terminal should erase the Endless bound to it, those with strong, unresolved feelings may linger for a time.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_014<tab>If you encounter such individuals, perhaps you could lend them an ear. For their hopes are proof that they once lived.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_KRILE_000_015<tab>Yesterland has an altogether different look. Each zone has a distinct character, 'twould seem.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_000_016<tab>That lively place yonder appears to be Yesterland. I wonder what manner of folk we will find there.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_ERENVILLE_000_017<tab>...Worry not, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I don't intend to halt my steps either.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_018<tab>Cahciua's already gone ahead. Let's get going too.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_YESTERLANDGUARD_000_019<tab>System reboot complete. <bleep> <bloop> Error. Error. User registration...conf-f-firmed.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_YESTERLANDGUARD_100_019<tab>I bid you welcome to Yesterland, where the dreams of children and inner children alike come true! Please enjoy your stay!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>Amazing... Is this also a recreation of an actual place?
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_021<tab>After a fashion. Yesterland is themed upon a period of peace, before the Storm Surge had engulfed the world in conflict.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_022<tab>It was a golden age for Alexandria, and they've captured it here in the form of an amusement park.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_000_023<tab>Well now, another large-scale attraction!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_Q1_001_023<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_A1_002_023<tab>Tell me I'm not the only one who's excited!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_A1_003_023<tab>It's exhausting just being here...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_A1_004_023<tab>It feels like the Gold Saucer.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_A1_005_023<tab>I'm put in mind of Lyhe Mheg.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_010_023<tab>Haha, I'm not ashamed to admit I'm excited as well, and I imagine this is how we're intended to feel.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_020_023<tab>So it goes with such places. But at the very least, it doesn't appear overly crowded.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_030_023<tab>It does, doesn't it? It's exciting to simply step through the entrance, and I imagine this is how we're intended to feel.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_040_023<tab>You mean you've visited the pixies' Garden of Dreams!? Thank goodness you are still with us...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_050_023<tab>'Tis all too easy to lose oneself in such a wondrous place. By the time you think to leave, dozens of years may have already passed.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_GRAHATIA_000_024<tab>And perhaps the very same could be said of this place...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_025<tab>On the far side of Yesterland is a castle. That's where the terminal is located, in the basement.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_026<tab>I'll go on ahead and wait for you there. Take what time you need to get acquainted with the locals.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CAHCIUA_000_027<tab>Have fun, now!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_028<tab>Like before, we'll speak with the Endless. We'll learn what's dear to them before doing what we must.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_029<tab>Right, let's start by exploring and get our bearings!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>The beautiful artwork on the ground depicts a swirl of stars. Perhaps such a sight was once visible in the Alexandrian night sky.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Appearing to be a domicile, this building resembles those that lie submerged in Heritage Found. The windows are composed of a colorful array of stained glass.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CHILDENDLESS04951_000_062<tab>Oh, hello there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! We're just talking about Ser Otis. Do you know him?
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CHILDENDLESS04951_000_063<tab>He's a bit odd and doesn't get jokes, but he's really strong and can vanquish fiends in a flash!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CHILDENDLESS04951_000_064<tab>He's probably out there fighting right now. When I grow up, I want to be strong like him!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_CHILDENDLESS04951_000_065<tab>When I grow up, I want to be strong like Ser Otis! I'm going to protect Queen Sphene!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>The “Ser Otis” the children spoke of calls to mind another Otis. It might be worth seeking the man out to confirm his identity.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>A man is engaged in battle with fiends. He may need a helping hand.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_OTIS_000_085<tab>'Tis plain you are no stranger to battle. If you would kindly tend to this fiend, I shall protect the children!
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_110<tab>Gods, what a surprise to meet Otis.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_111<tab>He might not be the exact same as the one we met in Heritage Found, but still...
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_112<tab>Thinking back, he mentioned that he was a test subject for soul preservation. That might explain why he's here in this way.
TEXT_KINGMF106_04951_WUKLAMAT_000_113<tab>In any case, I'd love to talk to him some more. There are some things I need to tell him.
